text: Iosif Aleksandrovich BrodskyAlso known as Josip, Josef or Joseph. (; ; 24 May 1940 â€“ 28 January 1996), better known as Joseph Brodsky, was a Russian- American writer. He won the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1987.
